title: Project-Based Mathematical Learning Design to Enhance CSCL Effectiveness in Large-Scale Corporate Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience Using Online Collaboration Tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening math problem-solving competencies through CSCL in corporate long-term educational settings

learning_goals: Learners increase interaction frequency with peers by over 40% during mathematical problem-solving processes in CSCL environments
Learners maintain a deep learning motivation of 3.5/5 points or higher while performing PBL tasks
Learners improve their understanding of complex mathematical concepts by 25% compared to pre-assessment through collaborative problem-solving processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
